title: Levi's Stadium
summary: Levi's Stadium is an American football stadium located in Santa Clara, California, just outside San Jose in the San Francisco Bay Area. It has served as the home venue for the National Football League (NFL)'s San Francisco 49ers since 2014. The stadium is located approximately 40 miles (64Â km) south of San Francisco and is named for Levi Strauss & Co., which purchased naming rights in 2013.
